sentences.sentence: He came from the twenty-third floor down to the lobby on the mezzanine to collect his mail before breakfast, and he believed—he hoped—that he looked passably well: doing all right.
sentences.translation: 早饭前，他从二十三楼走到夹层的门厅去取邮件。他相信——他希望——他看上去还过得去：一切都很好。

sentences.sentence: She has always been quick to pick things up, doing passably well in school without really trying.
sentences.translation: 她学东西向来很快，不用多努力书就能读得还不错。
